name: Aera
0:
”Alexa, turn on Diffuser”
”Alexa, turn off Diffuser”
”Alexa, increase scent level to 5 on my Diffuser”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Smart home scenting just got smarter and even more convenient. Now, Aera works with Amazon Alexa giving you voice control to turn your Aera on and off, remind you of your scent level and adjust the strength of scent in a room.

To turn your Aera on:
“Alexa, turn on [diffuser name]”

To find out the current scent level:
“Alexa, what is the scent level of [diffuser name]”

To change the scent level:
"Alexa, increase scent level to six on [diffuser name]"
*Scent levels range from one to ten on Aera, with ten as the highest. For Aera Mini diffusers the scent level ranges from one to five.

To turn your Aera off:
“Alexa, turn off [diffuser name]”

To find out more about Aera smart home fragrance, cheque out aeraforhome.com.

To use this skill you will need an Aera and an Aera Account, which you can setup in the AeraForHome mobile application.
